|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = Serial |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q32BVSIG; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Zentel;A3S56D40FTP-G5; |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.85 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.2 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.3 |pwr_barrel_len = 9 |pwr_pol = |serial = yes |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-LINK_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^TP-LINK_[0-9A-F]{6}$ |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 07/2010 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9283; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA, 5dBi fixed Omni Directional Antenna X 2 |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4-2.4835 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The FCC ID is not valid. Appears to be a AR7240 + AR9283 ([http://techbbs.zol.com.cn/1/47_6219.html source], [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=104080 source2], [http://5i01.com/topicdetail.php?f=110&t=1455242&p=2 source3], [http://itbbs.pconline.com.cn/network/12654721.html source4 - table]) device. The default SSID is 'TP-LINK_XXXXXX' where 'XXXXXX' is the last three octets of the wireless interface MAC address (uppercase letters). The power supply included with the unit is a '''Leader Electronics''' MU08-6090085-A1 (9V, 850mA). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=74112 On the DD-WRT forums]
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr841nd On the OpenWrt Wiki]
